The Plan

To understand their inner workings, we are going to engage in the process of creating a neural network through several interactive demonstrations, from processing input data to text generation. These demonstrations are powered by custom, GPT-4 integrated applications that simulate the decision making of neural nets (The same technology powering GPT-4 itself, how meta!).

The process of creating a neural network consists of three parts:

  • Input Computation
  • Output Generation
  • Iterative Refinement

It is important to note that neural networks are mostly used for tasks other than generating text. Text generation is the most culturally relevant right now, but the logic we are about to explore can be widely applied.
